string_theory.key_idea: Fundamental entities are 1D vibrating strings of size ~ℓ_s ≈ ℓ_P
string_theory.minimum_length: String length ℓ_s from T-duality (R ↔ ℓ_s²/R)
string_theory.spacetime_structure: Smooth at Planck scale but minimum probing distance
unique_predictions: Supersymmetry (possibly at TeV scale, not found yet)
string_theory.status: Most developed framework; no experimental confirmation

loop_quantum_gravity.key_idea: Space quantized as spin networks; geometry operators have discrete spectra
loop_quantum_gravity.status: Background-independent; BH entropy derived; dynamics incomplete

causal_dynamical_triangulations.key_idea: Path integral over simplicial spacetimes with causality
causal_dynamical_triangulations.extra_dimensions: Not required: 4D emerges at large scales
causal_dynamical_triangulations.gravity: Monte Carlo simulations of quantum gravity
unique_predictions: d = 2 at Planck scale, d = 4 at large scales
Causality essential for correct large-scale behavior

causal_set_theory.key_idea: Spacetime is fundamentally a discrete partial order (causal structure)
causal_set_theory.spacetime_structure: Discrete events with causal relations only

minimum_length.mechanism_varies: String: T-duality; LQG: discrete spectrum; CDT: simplex size; Causal sets: element spacing

modified_uncertainty.description: All predict GUP-like modifications: Δx ≥ ℏ/(2Δp) + corrections

black_hole_entropy.mechanism_varies: String: D-brane microstates; LQG: spin network punctures; CDT/Causal: counting arguments

discriminating_predictions.testability: Could be tested at TeV scale or via gravitational tests

discriminating_predictions.string: Replaced by pre-Big Bang or ekpyrotic scenario

experimental_status.direct_tests: All approaches untestable directly - require Planck-scale probes
indirect_tests: LHC (no extra dimensions or SUSY found yet)
CMB polarization - searches for LQC signatures
experimental_status.philosophical_difference: String: top-down (unification first); LQG: bottom-up (quantize GR); CDT/Causal: discrete approach
